transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Sarish Kalyan sir from Edcon company sir.
Executive: Yes.
Customer: Sarish Kalyan sir from Edcon company sir.
Executive: Yes, yes. Tell me what you want.
Customer: Yeah, sir. Good evening. Yeah. Good evening, sir. Pravesh Sharma this side from IndiaMART.
Executive: Uh-huh.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Actually, sir, we received one your one of your feedback regarding address change and meeting. So just want to know, sir, like what is the issue? Like I am not getting any solution or what is the issue, sir? Like we got multiple escalation from your side. Anything I can assist you, sir?
Customer: Yeah.
Customer: Yeah, I didn't get any lead from your side. What you want which type which type of leads I want. I didn't get any leads. So if any from last six months last I have taken July from July to now I didn't get any lead also one any I paid 25k. What is the use of that 25k?
Customer: I didn't I don't know about that. The service person before taking the
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Before paying the 25k the they said mispatching requirements the service person will come and he will do correction what you want.
Customer: Uh-huh.
Customer: So I'm requesting to come and do what what they what they will do for. That's why I'm asking for to send service person.
Executive: Okay, sir. We can do one thing, sir. Like since your pin code is not serviceable.
Customer: Uh.
Customer: See see see see one sec one sec before paying 20 taking taking the credentials from India joining into IndiaMART before joining IndiaMART also that that pin code only Sangareddy but they came into my office. Where is my office? In Hyderabad only. Office is in Hyderabad. They came to my office not Sangareddy pin code not you know they they not went to pin code. They came to my office in Hyderabad. Okay?
Customer: Before before purchasing before purchasing how you will come to my office and now I am if I am asking to come service person you are saying pin code is there there will go. How it's possible?
Executive: I'll explain you sir. I'll explain you what happened sir. We have uh like branches in particular pin code area. We don't have branches in each and every location of IndiaMART. But we have person who is voluntarily working for a new sales division.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: They are nearby.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Sir, all I'm saying sir if you want any changes sir we'll do a video call in front of you.
Executive: Sir, in front of you we will open your catalog. We will do all the changes as per your requirement and we will see uh what we can do to improve your leads, sir.
Customer: What?
Customer: Just come one you say don't say improve you will improve my leads. Improve what you will improve? Still now one one lead also I didn't get what you will improve. You tell me what is the what what is the purpose to take the IndiaMART? What is the use of taking of IndiaMART?
Executive: Sir, this is what I'm telling now sir if you saying you don't have any
Customer: [inaudible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting any leads from IndiaMART.

- Wants to know the use of paying 25k.

- Wants a service person to correct requirements.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video call to make changes.

- Executive explained branch locations and sales division.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None
